author: TimBoland
post_text: January 19, 2016 at 5:11 AM#1I'm trying to have a macro define a set of executors so that I can apply a command to multiple cue stacks.I feel like this should work but its not happening.[Pause] [Macro] [1] , where macro 1 = "@ Executor 2.101 + 2.102 + 2.103"

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: January 19, 2016 at 9:07 AM#2disable CLI for the Macro 1, so that a press of the macro in the macropool does not interact with the commandline.you need to use the macro via the pool for this to work:[Pause] [onscreen macro-pool item 1]

title: Whats wrong with this macro?
